repo_description: GraphQL API for Overwatch player information and stats

schemas.name: schema.graphql
schemas.content:
# Auto-generated by bin/generate-schema
# DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY, ALL CHANGES WILL BE OVERWRITTEN

type Achievement {
  name: String!
  achieved: Boolean!
}

type PlayerAccountStats {
  competitiveRank: Int
  achievements: [Achievement!]!
  quickplay: GamemodeStats!
  competitive: GamemodeStats!
}

type PlayerAccount {
  level: Int!
  region: String!
  displayName: String!
  platform: String!
  stats: PlayerAccountStats!
  portrait: String!
}

type Player {
  name: String!
  accounts: [PlayerAccount!]!
  account(region: String!, platform: String!): PlayerAccount
}

type Query {
  player(name: String!): Player
}
